name: crosslinked with either allyl sucrose (CAS Reg. No. 68784-14-5) or allyl pentaerythritol
FoodContactSubstance: Polyacrylic acid homopolymer, or copolymer of acrylic acid and up to 10 percent alkyl (C<sub>10</sub>-C<sub>30</sub>) methacrylate, crosslinked with either allyl sucrose (CAS Reg. No. 68784-14-5) or allyl pentaerythritol (CAS Reg. No. 91648-24-7); optionally contains up to 7 percent block copolymer surfactant of fatty acid (C<sub>12</sub>-C<sub>18</sub>) and polyethylene glycol.
